name: Ply Health
headline: Faster way to get providers in-network with payers.
description: Ply helps behavioral health providers (e.g. therapists, social workers, psychiatrists) see more patients by getting them in network with insurance companies like Aetna or Medicaid. Ply submits enrollments 2x faster using automation and AI enabled data validation.

founders.name: Samantha Wu, Founder
founders.description: Ply Health Co-founder. Previous Head of Bizops @ Finni (W23). Previously @ Cedar, SiteRx, Carlyle, Evercore.

# Enroll providers with payers. Fast.
Eliminate administrative headache and bill more with 70% fewer days to in network status.
[Request demo](https://plyhealth.com/<https:/calendly.com/sam-plyhealth>)
**Backed by**
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/d1R9AwP9XnlEyZvL7QrRzMYH5A.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BhmN9SQdeJddEXoqNTBxBKnmtd0.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BhmN9SQdeJddEXoqNTBxBKnmtd0.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BhmN9SQdeJddEXoqNTBxBKnmtd0.png?lossless=1)

Powering payer enrollment at:
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/z2xx6nATDqM6XREt0ucbwDCPfpg.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/z2xx6nATDqM6XREt0ucbwDCPfpg.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wY9RIxgLiXyXjSxIO9GUAmsDBuc.png?lossless=1)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eHLgawarL07Kd6ynZxUPkTQ6Y0.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eHLgawarL07Kd6ynZxUPkTQ6Y0.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QyzhIE3BkkW4aW0MxWhEixYTbSo.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QyzhIE3BkkW4aW0MxWhEixYTbSo.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QyzhIE3BkkW4aW0MxWhEixYTbSo.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/s2ypBqG4b7jxy8ZDOPmz3AGBTQk.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/s2ypBqG4b7jxy8ZDOPmz3AGBTQk.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/s2ypBqG4b7jxy8ZDOPmz3AGBTQk.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
## Is Ply right for my organization?
Ply works with behavioral health practices of all sizes and specialties.
### Digital telehealth
Enter provider data once and get in network with payers nation-wide.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6J8qq3CP85WMDvWDjsiLDc49NWM.png?lossless=1)
### Managed service organization (MSO)
Abstract away enrollment to focus on delivering value in other verticals. Connect and monitor network status via API.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WTDkmewiY9bIhoKjLYOaYjCPSkY.png?lossless=1)
### Traditional clinic
Bill more and grow patient network with AI-powered enrollments 70% faster than the industry standard.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ivA1CzAdVq3nb0zszap062ZOxqk.png?lossless=1)
# How does it work?
## One click apply
Onboard your data one time, apply for as many payers as you’d like with a click.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NDbir1K5XkSl4YmWrDmkxf9W0I.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NDbir1K5XkSl4YmWrDmkxf9W0I.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/txXdjecJD8L9joDzIBWAzuoKpc.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/txXdjecJD8L9joDzIBWAzuoKpc.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
## Monitor in real-time
Monitor the process of all enrolments in real-time through the Ply Health dashboard.
## Get in network fast
Ply’s data checks, AI submission and programmatic follow-up ensures that you get in network ASAP.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BSYdycPUiWRpsPAllUHcM5uTjQ0.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BSYdycPUiWRpsPAllUHcM5uTjQ0.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
### We work with payers in all 50 states.
### We work with payers in all 50 states.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8fYZgkzEG5UOJNqCHGdzXJeoTA.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ujzqa6FaJ5FzvnQeMMm06l5SPyo.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ujzqa6FaJ5FzvnQeMMm06l5SPyo.png?lossless=1)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jkC59ACtitUAV4MrxgYyJnTRpUk.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/aO6o1U3sorthcXKRBo5Qe2fUc.png?lossless=1)

# Get started today
[Request demo](https://plyhealth.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1bPQtk49RSd-DPbwiUTpDVAqzu3r>)
## What our customers are saying:
  * Working with ... Ply has been a pleasure. They're very professional and communicative, and their technology platform makes the process of contracting and credentialing seamless.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VmF9H68i6p1eCyhBVtC9mP3mOY.png?lossless=1)
**Aimun Malik**
Chief Executive Officer at ANNA
  * Ply has made payer contracting and enrollment incredibly efficient, painless, and transparent for our startup. Their professional communication and advanced technology platform have streamlined our contracting and credentialing process, saving us significant time, headache, and money. We’re able to get to market quicker, which boosts our ability to grow fast. 10/10 team and experience.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/iRKYy28KafVvkQxIjiDpHWlk.png)
**Yash M. Patel**
Co-Founder & CEO at Legion Health
  * Ply Health has truly revolutionized the contracting and credentialing process for our providers. We've witnessed tangible results in significantly improved contracting timelines and increased provider satisfaction.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jvdYy5eX8dzVk3W7VuUC9Z4GV4.jpeg?lossless=1)
**Nicola Brummer**
Provider Account Manager at Finni
  * Working with … Ply Health has been an incredibly positive experience. [They] have made a significant impact in how quickly our new clinicians are able to start seeing clients. We would highly recommend Ply to any practices looking to entrust their credentialing to a team to professionals!

## Is Ply right for my organization?
Ply works with behavioral health practices of all sizes and specialties.
### Digital telehealth
Enter provider data once and get in network with payers nation-wide.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6J8qq3CP85WMDvWDjsiLDc49NWM.png?lossless=1)
### Managed service organization (MSO)
Abstract away enrollment to focus on delivering value in other verticals. Connect and monitor network status via API.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WTDkmewiY9bIhoKjLYOaYjCPSkY.png?lossless=1)
### Traditional clinic
Bill more and grow patient network with AI-powered enrollments 70% faster than the industry standard.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ivA1CzAdVq3nb0zszap062ZOxqk.png?lossless=1)
# How does it work?
## One click apply
Onboard your data one time, apply for as many payers as you’d like with a click.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NDbir1K5XkSl4YmWrDmkxf9W0I.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NDbir1K5XkSl4YmWrDmkxf9W0I.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/txXdjecJD8L9joDzIBWAzuoKpc.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/txXdjecJD8L9joDzIBWAzuoKpc.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
## Monitor in real-time
Monitor the process of all enrolments in real-time through the Ply Health dashboard.
## Get in network fast
Ply’s data checks, AI submission and programmatic follow-up ensures that you get in network ASAP.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BSYdycPUiWRpsPAllUHcM5uTjQ0.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BSYdycPUiWRpsPAllUHcM5uTjQ0.png?scale-down-to=1024&lossless=1)
### We work with payers in all 50 states.
### We work with payers in all 50 states.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k8fYZgkzEG5UOJNqCHGdzXJeoTA.png?lossless=1)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ujzqa6FaJ5FzvnQeMMm06l5SPyo.png?lossless=1)

generated_description:
**Ply Health**: Streamlining Behavioral Health Enrollment

Founded in 2024 and based in New York, Ply Health is tackling a significant pain point in the healthcare industry: getting behavioral health providers in-network with insurance payers, like Aetna and Medicaid. The company emerged from *Y Combinator's* Batch S24 and currently operates with a tight-knit team of just three employees.

### Mission
Ply Health’s mission is simple yet impactful: to expedite the enrollment process for providers seeking to join insurance networks. They eliminate the "administrative headache" that comes with this task, thereby allowing healthcare providers to focus more on patient care rather than paperwork. Their solution reduces the time needed to achieve network status by an impressive 70%.

### How It Works
Ply offers an automated, AI-enabled platform that facilitates this process. They boast a two-fold increase in the speed of enrollment submissions compared to traditional methods. With a user-friendly interface, providers can input their information once and apply for multiple payers simultaneously, keeping track of their enrollment status in real-time through the Ply dashboard.

### Who They Serve
Ply Health targets behavioral health practices of various sizes, including digital telehealth providers, managed service organizations, and traditional clinics. The platform is versatile, catering to the unique needs of different specialties within the behavioral health landscape.

### Backing and Recognition
As a Y Combinator startup, Ply utilizes cutting-edge technology to enforce data checks and enhance submission accuracy. Their automation tools enable providers to monitor real-time progress, making the daunting credentialing process almost seamless.

### Customer Feedback
User testimonials highlight Ply's efficiency and professionalism. Many clients have noted how Ply's technology has truly transformed their contracting and credentialing processes, making them faster, more transparent, and less stressful.

### Next Steps
If you’re struggling with provider enrollment or simply looking to enhance your operational efficiency, Ply Health invites you to explore their services. You can request a demo directly from their website: [Ply Health](https://plyhealth.com). Here’s an opportunity to go from chaotic paperwork to a streamlined, automated system that prioritizes the most crucial thing of all—helping providers see more patients faster.

Overall, Ply Health is on a mission to become an essential player in the health-tech space, combining healthcare with smart technology to pave the way for a more efficient future.
